p: The degree of inhibition of linoleic acid peroxidation (LPO) was performed according to [ 28] described in detail by [ 29]. Absorbances of reaction mixtures were measured at λ = 480 nm. Six dilution of CPS were examined to plot a dose–response curve. The result was expressed as the concentration of polysaccharides providing 50% of activity based on a dose-dependent mode of action (EC 50).
